title: Alienation of Lands vested in the Land Reform Commission for public purposes
decision_details:
- The proposal made by the Hon. Minister of Lands, for the  alienation of the following Lands vested in the Land Reform Commission for public purposes, was approved by the Cabinet.  

*	a plot of land in extent of 07.31 perches situated in the Korathota area in Kaduwela to the Municipal Council Kaduwela for the construction of a Community Centre; and 

*	a plot of land in extent of 05 perches situated in Chilaw to the Multipurpose Co-operative Society Ltd., Chilaw for the construction of a building for a Co-operative Bank.
